text: Tokoroga ware no meiryona shirushi ga, kare-ra ni yomi kikasa reta toki, ware to au koto o nozomanai-sha-tachi wa itta. `Kore to wa betsu no kuruan o motte ki nasai. Soretomo kore o kaizan shi nasai.' Itte yaru ga i. `Watashi wa jibun no sairyo de kore o kaizan suru koto wa dekinai. Tada, watashi ni keiji sa reta mono ni shitagau dakedearu. Watashi ga moshi omoni somuitanaraba, idaina-bi no chobatsu o hontoni osoreru
